attributes.action: Get the EU to audit and sign off all EU accountsthe UK was a member.
attributes.additional_details: The EU has never had its accounts passed by auditors. It's a black hole sucking money in.
attributes.background: The EU is claiming that the UK owes payments. The EU must have all their accounts for the time that the UK was a member audited and verified by a reputable accountancy firm. The EU must prove what they claim, they have no right at all demanding money on figures that they just think are right.

rejection.details:
In any case, the EU's accounts are audited by the European Court of Auditors (ECA). You can find out more about the ECA and its work here:

http://www.eca.europa.eu/en/Pages/ecadefault.aspx
